title: S12 Ep231: Holiday Spirits, Witches, Elves and a Legion of Ghosts
itunes:title: Holiday Spirits, Witches, Elves and a Legion of Ghosts
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is in the Holiday Spirit...with Holiday Spirits, Witches, Elves and a Legion of Ghosts and guest Linda Raedisch.

Not so very long ago, Yuletide was as much a chilling season of ghosts & witches as it was a festival of goodwill. In today's episode, youll rub elbows with veiled spirits, learn the true perils of elves, & discover a bestiary of enchanted creatures. Rife with the more frightful characters from folklore & the seasons most petulant ghosts, this show takes you on a spooky sleigh ride from the silvered firs of a winter forest to the mirrored halls of the Snow Queen.

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
